name: TriangleHits
description:
STRG + MOUSEWHEEL for a better view.

Triangle hits its normally an android game where you have to tap as fast as possible to collect and steal other players coins.

It also has a singleplayer mode.

Try out the original on playstore:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=de.hannemann.trianglehits

Or try multiplayer here:
https://hannemanndev.de/trianglehits/play
